hero.title: Inventing the Future of Work.
hero.subtitle: We don't wait for the future; we build it. Our labs focus on the frontier of Agentic AI and Complex Adaptive Systems, bridging the gap between academic breakthrough and enterprise ROI.

researchAreas.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration
researchAreas.desc: Building frameworks where agents can debate, vote, and collaborate to solve non-deterministic problems.

researchAreas.title: Long-Horizon Planning
researchAreas.desc: Engineering agents that can execute tasks requiring weeks of duration without losing context.

researchAreas.title: Governance & Alignment
researchAreas.desc: Creating 'Constitutional AI' frameworks that ensure autonomous agents obey regulatory boundaries.

researchAreas.title: AI Economics
researchAreas.desc: Modeling the P&L impact of replacing human labor with compute cost in specific verticals.
